meanings.definition: A person who dislikes, despises, or is strongly prejudiced against women.
meanings.sent1: Some misogynists believe that women are inferior to men.
meanings.sent2: The group of misogynists gathered to discuss their views on women.
meanings.sent3: The misogynists at the meeting argued about who could dislike women more.
meanings.sent4: Her father was a misogynist, seeing women as weak and incompetent.
meanings.sent5: The media portrayed the villain in the movie as a misogynist, adding depth to the character.
